Package main.Teams

Class PlayerTeam

java.lang.Object
main.Teams.Team
main.Teams.PlayerTeam
public class PlayerTeam extends Team
An extension of Team that handles methods and variables needed for the player's team, including their selected name, their inventory, reserve players, money, and season points.

    • overwriteSlot

      public void overwriteSlot(Athlete[] array, int slot, Athlete athlete)
      Description copied from class: Team
      Completely overwrites the given slot with the given Athlete. Use with extreme caution, as the previous occupant will be discarded.
      Overrides:
      overwriteSlot in class Team
      Parameters:
      array - The array for the Athlete to be added to.
      slot - The index for the Athlete to be added to in the given array.
      athlete - The Athlete to be added.

    • addToReserves

      public void addToReserves(Athlete[] reserveAthletes)

    • printTeam

      public String printTeam(boolean toSell)
      Returns details of all Athlete members of the player's main team array.
      Parameters:
      toSell - Whether the information is being printed for purposes of selling Athletes at the shop; in this case, the resale price is also printed.
      Returns:
      String containing the names, specializations, and (depending on toSell bool) sell costs of Athletes in the main team.

    • addRandom

      public String addRandom(Athlete newAthlete, int slot)
      Adds a new Athlete to the given reserve slot. For use only by AthleteJoins random events.
      Parameters:
      newAthlete - The Athlete to be added.
      slot - The slot to add the Athlete to.
      Returns:
      String confirming new Athlete's placement.

    • emptySlot

      public void emptySlot(Athlete[] roster, int slot)
      Replaces any Athlete in the given array and slot with a dummy. Use with caution!
      Parameters:
      roster - The array to remove an Athlete from.
      slot - The slot within the given array to remove an Athlete from.
